dmca.title: Copyrights violation
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Spiritual Beings [mailto:info@spiritualbeings.org] 
Sent: Wednesday, April 06, 2005 8:37 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyrights violation


Hello,
 
My name is Eitan and I am one of the owners of Spiritual Beings Records.
 
Our unreleased cd is being published at www. psyreactor.com without our
consent. 
 
I am referring to "Tara Putra - Groom mountains". It is labeled in the site
as:
 
" <http://www.psyreactor.com/viewtopic.php?p=28263> Psytrance (Psytrance
2005)
Spiritual Beings Records
Tara Putra
Groom Mountains [2005]
by Godcha (orig by MYCEL)"

We at Spiritual Beings have the exclusive rights of the music in this CD and
we strongly object to this misuse of our material and asset. We never
authorized no one to use our material in this fashion and we are asking your
help in disabling access to this material.
More info about the cd, including track list, samples etc can be found at:
www.spiritualbeings.org/sbcd4.html
 
All info in this email is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, I am
authorized to act on behalf of Spiritual Beings that own the exclusive
rights for the music that is  infringed. 
Looking forward on hearing from you,
Eitan
Spiritual Beings
 
---------------------------
We are all,
Spiritual Beings
www.spiritualbeings.org
 
Contact number: +52-987-87-60787
